name: Pick or Skip
overview:
Pick or Skip has invented the online speed-meeting

Pick or Skip organizes online speed-meeting events for people living in the same city. Its users video chat in order to answer a specific need they have. The main types of speed-meeting events are : looking for job/employees, babysitters, roommates, investors and networking. It is an easy way to meet and stay in touch with people in function of your needs. Pick or Skip allows its users to take part in events in order to meet people who are able to fulfill their needs. To do so, they just need to click on the “join” button of the event of their choice. During or after the video chat users can “pick” their interlocutor to stay in touch. They can also “skip” the ones that are of no interest to them. The Pick or Skip is most efficient solution to find the people you are looking for the using technology to its numerous advantages : -quality meeting : while participating in an event users are guarantied to meet dozens of different people answering their need. -time efficiency : with Pick or Skip no need to waste time whether it is going in many different places to meet people or waiting days for an answer to a small ad .
-real interaction : the use of “video-chat” offers the benefits of face-to-face conversation.
